node.hostelName: Hostal La Terraza de San Antonio

content.value:
Hostal La Terraza is located in the neighbourhood called San Antonio known neighbourhood of the west of Cali. It is bordered to the north by the El Penon neighbourhood, to the east by the La Merced neighborhood and Calle 5.ª, to the south east by Santa Rosa and San Bosco, to the south by San Cayetano and to the west by the San Antonio Aqueduct and finally the Crystals.

Our property offer two types of room, mixed rooms have private bathrooms, very clean with a colonial touch where towels, hand soap and padlocks are available to store your belongings, in the private rooms they are very comfortable two of them have balconies.

Set in Cali, 1.3 km from Jorge Isaacs Theater, Hostal La Terraza de San Antonio provides a tour desk and free WiFi throughout the property. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shared lounge and currency exchange for guests.
At the hostel every room includes a wardrobe and a private bathroom.

Popular points of interest near Hostal La Terraza de San Antonio include La Ermita Church, Modern Art Museum La Tertulia and Artisan Park Loma de la Cruz. The nearest airport is Alfonso Bonilla Aragón International Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

description.description: Hostal la terraza is a property that declared cultural heritage and offers three shared rooms with private bathroom and five private rooms, there are also three terraces for the use of our guests, within the services we offer: wifi, laundry and breakfast included.
